espnscrapeR 0.5.0
  • Reference

Get ESPN QBR for College football

Source: R/get_college_qbr.R
get_college_qbr.Rd

Get ESPN QBR for College football

get_college_qbr(season = 2020, week = NA)

Arguments

season

Numeric or character - greater than 2004
week

Numeric or character - typically 1 to 15 or Bowls

Value

tibble

Examples


# Get college QBR from 2011 season as a whole
get_college_qbr(season = 2011, week = NA)

#> Scraping QBR totals for 2011!
#> # A tibble: 125 x 26
#>    season  week player_id player_uid     player_guid        first_name last_name
#>     <int> <int> <chr>     <chr>          <chr>              <chr>      <chr>    
#>  1   2011    NA 4241464   s:20~l:23~a:4… 1b10c3ae12ed70355… Mac        Jones    
#>  2   2011    NA 4362887   s:20~l:23~a:4… 7e9fbd60951e2d9a8… Justin     Fields   
#>  3   2011    NA 4362874   s:20~l:23~a:4… fb2dadd974730df63… Matt       Corral   
#>  4   2011    NA 4361259   s:20~l:23~a:4… 2430b06b1be60b7a6… Zach       Wilson   
#>  5   2011    NA 4034946   s:20~l:23~a:4… 15de87c34f4d81be4… Kyle       Trask    
#>  6   2011    NA 4244068   s:20~l:23~a:4… 29586a3c56d90866b… Dustin     Crum     
#>  7   2011    NA 4426348   s:20~l:23~a:4… f03f3238b0356f0e5… Jayden     Daniels  
#>  8   2011    NA 4360310   s:20~l:23~a:4… 76111495d1d923331… Trevor     Lawrence 
#>  9   2011    NA 4046678   s:20~l:23~a:4… 510fa7104a068535e… Ian        Book     
#> 10   2011    NA 4427936   s:20~l:23~a:4… 54cca29ed4a6b64a5… Grayson    McCall   
#> # … with 115 more rows, and 19 more variables: display_name <chr>,
#> #   short_name <chr>, headshot_href <chr>, age <int>, team_name <chr>,
#> #   team_short_name <chr>, slug <chr>, team_id <chr>, team_u_id <chr>,
#> #   qbr_total <chr>, pts_added <chr>, qb_plays <chr>, epa_total <chr>,
#> #   pass <chr>, run <chr>, exp_sack <chr>, penalty <chr>, qbr_raw <chr>,
#> #   sack <chr>

# Get college QBR from 2019 season week 1
get_college_qbr(2019, 1)

#> Scraping QBR for week 1 of 2019!
#> # A tibble: 125 x 26
